description.narrative: The first five-year phase of the Government of Tonga's (GoT) 15-year Education Policy Framework has been supported by NZAID and the World Bank through the Tonga Education Support Program (TESP). TESP's objectives are; (i) to improve the quality of schooling; (ii) to provide for the equitable delivery of resources and services via the introduction of Minimum Service Standards (MSS), school based management/planning and school grants; and (iii) to strengthen management, policy-making and M&#38;#38;E within the Ministry of Education. The World Bank Fast Track Education Initiative and AusAID recently supported a Tongan language Early Grade Reading Assessment to test reading skills levels in Forms 1 to 3.Funding is to support for a Bridging Design Year (2010-11) and the design of a new five year education program (2011-12 to 2015-16). Through the Bridging Design Year, it is intended that the groundwork be undertaken to transition the current TESP into a program of fuller sector support by mid-201
